name: Detailed Icon
description:
Make the small icon in the bottom right corner of multiplayer match the Slugcats you're using, not only Survivors.
[让多人游戏中右下角的小图标符合你使用的蛞蝓猫，而不仅仅是求生者。]

At the same time, change the icon displayed when opening the map and the Region/Safer button icon to the corresponding SlugCats.
[同时让打开地图时显示的图标、Region/Safair 按钮图标 也更改成对应的蛞蝓猫。]

Support custom Slug Cat, please refer to GitHub for details.
[支持自定义蛞蝓猫，详情请见GitHub。]


github：https://github.com/YangXu636/DetailedIcon
